logs:
• MODAL UI FIX: Overlays now block background button clicks for improved focus
• JSON SYSTEM: Fully integrated admin-only JSON saving for global and local configurations
• SHIELD V2: Integrated Anti-AFK movement, Auto-Rejoin on disconnect, and real-time activity feed
• UI REHAUL: Fixed CanvasGroup cornering, standardized top-bar navigation, and added dynamic theme switching
• SAFETY: Implemented dual-click Full Reset, clipboard bot-linking, and rate-limit handling for webhooks
• MONITORING: Enhanced heartbeat timer with minimized-state live updates and custom interval settings
